void cancelRequestsFor (Channel *pChannel)
 This method cancels the requests for the input channel.
void cancelRequestsFor (ReplyMessageHandler *pHandler, Reason reason=REASON_CHANNEL_LOST)
 Given a pointer to a reply handler, this method will remove any reference to it in the reply handler elements so will not receive a message or time out when it is not supposed to.
void addReplyOrders (const ReplyOrders &replyOrders, Channel *pChannel)
 Allocates and fills out the reply IDs for pending requests for a bundle on a channel.
void failRequest (Request &request, Reason reason)
 Cleans up when a request has failed, and informs the handler.

void Mercury::RequestManager::cancelRequestsFor ( ReplyMessageHandler *  pHandler,
Reason  reason = REASON_CHANNEL_LOST 
)

Given a pointer to a reply handler, this method will remove any reference to it in the reply handler elements so will not receive a message or time out when it is not supposed to.

This method cancels the requests for the input channel.
